@vishalkverma05 @ZomatoIN Hi Vishal, you can extend your membership by renewing it from the app. We have various third party vendors like Paytm, Curefit, HDFC which provide you a code once you fulfill their eligibility criteria. You can get a zero cost membership extension from them.
